item.description:
The topic of this event is how green and ethical business practices can be a powerful path to profit when done correctly. Some of the things we'll talk about include how to deal with the expense and hassle of being environmentally friendly, and how you can benefit from ethical alliances with your competition.

The Marketing Cafe™ is the online radio show that features simple, yet highly effective ideas for solopreneurs and small business owners like you who want to make a good living while making a difference in the world.

Get Show Access Info here: http://wp.me/P29Qf9-rs

Date: Thursday, October 18, 2012

Time: 12 noon Eastern Time
(48 hour replay available if your schedule doesn't cooperate).

The featured guest speaker is Shel Horowitz, green marketing consultant and copywriter, and book publishing consultant.

Your host is marketing results coach Mark Reinert, founder of Authentic Business Growth, LLC and the creator of the Business Growth Dojo™ the definitive business incubator for independent professionals and owners of small service-based businesses.

Get Show Access Info here: http://wp.me/P29Qf9-rs

During this program you will learn:

  • How you can be green and ethical during tough financial times.
  • How does ethical/green marketing differ from ordinary marketing?
  • The best way to start with green practices and how you can to get your customers to notice and to care.
  • Why you don't need to worry about your competition or market share. (This will help you relax and enjoy your work more.)
  • The positive impact that green guerrilla marketing can have on your business.
  • How you can seek and benefit from alliances with your competition that feel good and help your business.
  • Why green marketing doesn't have to be expensive.

Get Show Access Info here: http://wp.me/P29Qf9-rs
item.name: The Road to Business Success is Green and Ethical
